## üß± PHASE 1: üß∞ **SCAFFOLDING SYSTEM**

### üõ† Auto Scaffold Daemons, CLI, Docs

Use this system daemon:

```ts
// packages/agents/scaffoldDaemon@1.js
const fs = require("fs");
const path = require("path");

module.exports = function scaffold({ type, name }) {
  const base = `packages/agents/${name}.js`;
  const template = `module.exports = function ${name.replace(/[@.]/g, "_")}(input) {
  console.log("[${name}] Running with input:", input);
};`;

  if (!fs.existsSync(base)) fs.writeFileSync(base, template);

  const regPath = "packages/agents/agentRegistry.json";
  const registry = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(regPath));
  registry[name] = { type, status: "active" };
  fs.writeFileSync(regPath, JSON.stringify(registry, null, 2));
};
```

‚úÖ Use it in CLI:

```bash
mys daemon:new reflectionDaemon@2 --type=reflect
```

‚úÖ Result:
- Agent file is scaffolded
- Registered in `agentRegistry.json`
- Auto-doc trigger created in `docs/`

## üß© 1. üîå STACK ADAPTERS

Introduce a new daemon:

```ts
// packages/adapters/stackAdapterDaemon@1.js
module.exports = function adaptToStack({ stackType }) {
  switch (stackType) {
    case "Next.js":
      return {
        outputPath: "pages/api/",
        triggerLocation: "runtime/scheduler/",
        templateEngine: "jsx"
      };
    case "Astro":
      return {
        outputPath: "src/pages/",
        triggerLocation: "astro/data/",
        templateEngine: "mdx"
      };
    case "Flask":
      return {
        outputPath: "templates/",
        triggerLocation: "app/triggers/",
        templateEngine: "jinja"
      };
    default:
      throw new Error("Unknown stackType");
  }
};
```

üß† This lets all daemons rewire where they write, deploy, and build based on your environment.

---

## üß† 2. üîç FILESYSTEM INTROSPECTOR

```ts
// packages/utils/introspectProject.js
module.exports = function introspect(dir) {
  if (fs.existsSync(`${dir}/package.json`) && fs.existsSync(`${dir}/pages/`)) return "Next.js";
  if (fs.existsSync(`${dir}/app.py`)) return "Flask";
  if (fs.existsSync(`${dir}/astro.config.mjs`)) return "Astro";
  return "custom";
};
```

Use this in:
```bash
mys adapt .
```

‚úÖ System reads your codebase  
‚úÖ Loads appropriate adapter config  
‚úÖ Rewrites daemon output paths + schema locations
